title: Ok, I've got some time to play the game :)
body:
I enter the selction screen, picks and bans.

I enter op.gg, see the match up.

Ok, I'm not willing to play this game anymore, and the match hasnt even started. I'll play this shit and go to do any other thing.

SAD.

replies.body:
Yep, another wonderful normal match with bronzes and vs golds. I wont tell you the result, I bet you can guess it by yourselves.

Enjoy the game, I'm done for today.
I looked you up and can't find the match in question so im calling bs.

> [{quoted}](name=I am Pacman,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=60Yjowwh,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2017-03-24T22:34:19.995+0000)
>
> I looked you up and can't find the match in question so im calling bs.

"lol this is my boards account trust me my main has problems all the time"

Literally a boards catfish.

As I told the other guy, I dont need my other account to prove you shit. This account is enough to see how broken the match making is. Actually, any account is, if you are smurfin 4 leagues under your skill level you can win those unfair games, still, they are unfair.

I dont need my other account to prove you shit.

Just look at my last game with zyra in this account, and the previous one if you want to. I won those games, yes, still, not fun and unfair games. So unfair that I stopped playing this account, I dont like to play handicapped, than you.
